thread.title: Prep football: Week 10 schedule and scores
thread.title_full: Prep football: Week 10 schedule and scores

title: Prep football: Week 10 schedule and scores
text:
live on KSL.com , such as the SportsBeat Game Night Game of the Week: Mountain Crest at Sky View . 
Heading out to a game? Remember to tag your photos on Twitter using #KSLGameNight and we'll feature some of the best in a weekly gallery on the SportsBeat Facebook page . 
If you have video of your games, upload them to YouTube and send us a link on Twitter ( @kslsports ), on Facebook or via email at sportsbeat@ksl.com . 
And don't forget to watch KSL 5 on Saturday evenings at 6 p.m. for SportsBeat Game Night Live, a show dedicated to all things prep sports. We will have extended highlights, interviews and even some special features that you won't want to miss. 
If you can't see the scoreboard below, you can view the schedule/scores on the Prep Scoreboard page.
